definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: It is the essence of what I mean when I talk about eating to flourish.
sentences.chinese: 這正是當我談論食療健身時的想說的本義。

sentences.english: The saying means no matter how skillful a housewife is, she can't cook a meal without rice literally.
sentences.chinese: 本義爲再巧的主婦，要是沒有米也做不出飯來。

sentences.english: According to the relation of sememes, a word has both original meaning and extended meaning.
sentences.chinese: 從詞義義位之間的關係看，詞有本義和引申義。

sentences.english: The paper introduces a high-power detecting - device based on magnetostrictive effect for the NDT of steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 本義介紹了大功率磁致伸縮檢測儀的研製。

sentences.english: name If we named it based on what it is, it's a name.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們基於本義來命名，它就是一個。

sentences.english: There are different interpretations for the original meaning of" Yue".
sentences.chinese: 對“龠”本義的解釋，古說頗多，分歧很大。

sentences.english: Yoshiaki Miyamoto hooked just one eel on his morning stint on Lake Biwa, near Kyoto.
sentences.chinese: 京都附近琵琶湖，宮本義明早上出海釣到一條鰻魚。

sentences.english: Its original meaning is that the fox borrows the tiger's ferocity to bluster other wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 本義是狐狸藉着老虎的威勢去嚇唬別的野獸。

sentences.english: 'Dou', denoting food containers in ancient times, means the same thing as 'shu' did in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 豆的本義爲古食內器，其今義在古代用“菽”表示。

sentences.english: The original meaning of inculcation is delivering, and it is a neutral concept.
sentences.chinese: 灌輸的本義是“輸送”，它是個中性的概念。

sentences.english: The sacrificial rites are not only commemoratory activities, but originally the offerings to gods.
sentences.chinese: 這種祭祀不能僅視爲紀念活動，其本義就是祀神。

sentences.english: The core of success is achieving one’s wishes.
sentences.chinese: 而成功的本義就是指達到自己的願望。

sentences.english: The notion of analogy came from music language in the West Zhou Dynasty, referring to comparison by species.
sentences.chinese: 興的概念來自西周的樂語，其本義是連類譬喻。

definition: Shuowen Jiezi, the original Han dynasty Chinese character dictionary with 10,516 entries, authored by Xu Shen 許慎|许慎[Xu3 Shen4] in 2nd century
phonetic component of a Chinese character
see 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
ideogram plus phonetic (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/also known as phonogram, phonetic compound or picto-phonetic character
combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements/also known as joint ideogram or associative compounds
reading or phonetic value of a character
